mapper.sql: select gSignInHistory.ID AS ID, gOrder.ID AS ORDER_ID, gOrder.CODE AS CODE, gOrder.STATUS AS STATUS, gOrder.REPORT_PRINT_REQUIRED AS REPORT_PRINT_REQUIRED, gOrder.SAMPLE_TYPE AS SAMPLE_TYPE, gOrder.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, gOrder.CREATOR_NAME AS CREATOR_NAME, gOrder.ACTUAL_PRICE AS ACTUAL_PRICE, gOrder.SUBMITOR_NAME AS SUBMITOR_NAME, gOrder.SUBMIT_TIME AS submitTime, gCustomer.ID AS CUSTOMER_ID, gCustomer.NAME AS CUSTOMER_NAME, gCustomer.PHONE AS CUSTOMER_PHONE, gCustomer.SEX AS CUSTOMER_SEX, gAgency.ID AS AGENCY_ID, gAgency.NAME AS AGENCY_NAME, gtProduct.ID AS PRODUCT_ID, gtProduct.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, gtProduct.CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE, gtProduct.GUIDING_PRICE AS PRODUCT_GUIDING_PRICE, gOrder.REPORT_GENERATE_TASK AS REPORT_GENERATE_TASK FROM GHEALTH_SAMPLE_DELIVERY_DETAILS gSignInHistory LEFT JOIN ghealth_order gOrder ON gSignInHistory.ORDER_ID =gOrder.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_customer gCustomer ON gOrder.CUSTOMER_ID = gCustomer.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_agency gAgency ON gOrder.AGENCY_ID = gAgency.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_testing_product gtProduct ON gOrder.PRODUCT_ID = gtProduct.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_order_report_generate_task gTask ON gOrder.REPORT_GENERATE_TASK = gTask.ID
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ghealth_order_send_details gSignInHistory LEFT JOIN ghealth_order gOrder ON gSignInHistory.ORDER_ID =gOrder.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_customer gCustomer ON gOrder.CUSTOMER_ID = gCustomer.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_agency gAgency ON gOrder.AGENCY_ID = gAgency.ID LEFT JOIN ghealth_testing_product gtProduct ON gOrder.PRODUCT_ID = gtProduct.ID
